Description.Name: Misjump - Minor Damage
Description.Details:
Darius comes into your office and hands you a datapad, "Commander, we have the cost estimates to repair the circuit boards damaged from that misjump."

You take the datapad and scroll through the information, "It is going to cost up to ¢4,000,000 to fix those components?!"

Darius responds, "Yes sir.  Some of them are quite rare, especially considering our current location."

You toss the datapad onto your desk, "And if we opt to NOT do the repairs?"

Darius picks up the datapad, scrolls through some data, "No lasting effects other than we lose the small power boost from the Pirate Drive Harness and no quicker jumps via Pirate Points until we also repair the console."

Darius calmly awaits your decision.

Description.Name: Postpone Repairs
Description.Details: Wait 14 Days

Description.Name: Postpone
Description.Details:
You think for a long moment before responding, "We really cannot spare the funds right now.  Let's revist this in a fortnight and see if we can fit it in the budget."

Darius nods, "Very well, Commander."

<color=#FFA500>The KF Console is damaged and offline until repairs can be made.</color>

Description.Name: Postpone Repairs
Description.Details: Wait 30 Days

Description.Name: Postpone
Description.Details:
You think for a long moment before responding, "We really cannot spare the funds right now.  Let's revist this next month and see if we can fit it in the budget."

Darius nods, "Very well, Commander."

<color=#FFA500>The KF Console is damaged and offline until repairs can be made.</color>

Description.Name: Just Repair the Harness
Description.Details: [Estimated cost of  up to ¢3,000,000]

Description.Name: Repair Partial Minor Damage
Description.Details: You think for a long moment before responding, "Get the work on the Pirate Drive Harness done, Darius. We need to at least be back to full operational levels. We can look getting the Console running later." Darius smiles, "Understood, Commander." Later that day, you run into Dairus in one of the corridors, "Commander, The work has commenced and should be done soon. The final bill came in at ¢502842.

Description.Name: Repair Console and Argo Drives
Description.Details: [Estimated cost of  up to ¢4,000,000]

Description.Name: Repair All Minor Damage
Description.Details:
You think for a long moment before responding, "Get the work done, Darius.  We have the funds, and what are the odds of another misjump like that happening again anyways?"

Darius smiles, "Hopefully very slim, Commander."

Later that day, you run into Dairus in one of the corridors, "Commander, The work has commenced and should be done soon.  The final bill came in at ¢1502842.
